text: Mats Julian Hummels (; born 16 December 1988) is a German football defender who plays for Bayern Munich and represents the Germany national football team. He represented Germany in both the UEFA Euro 2012 and the 2014 FIFA World Cup. Since 2010, Hummels has been a regular for the German team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League DFB-Pokal Europe Other Total
